Module com.example.demo1
Package com.example.demo1.AccountController

Class RegisterController

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo1.AccountController.RegisterController
public class RegisterController extends Object
The RegisterController class manages the functionality of the user registration screen. It handles user registration, password validation, navigation to the login screen, and displaying error alerts.

    • initialize

      protected void onRegisterButtonClick()

    • confirmedPasswordCheck

      protected boolean confirmedPasswordCheck(String password, String confirmPassword)
      Checks if the password and confirm password fields match.
      Parameters:
      password - The password entered by the user.
      confirmPassword - The confirmed password entered by the user.
      Returns:
      True if passwords match, otherwise false.

    • existedAccount

      protected boolean existedAccount(String username, List<Account> accounts)
      Checks if an account with the given username already exists.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check.
      accounts - The list of accounts to search in.
      Returns:
      True if the account exists, otherwise false.

    • onLoginLinkClick

      protected void onLoginLinkClick()
      Handles login link click events.
